Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam addressed a press conference before the match against England.
He compared his captaincy role to Virat Kohli's in the Indian team.
He mentioned the difficulty of giving advice and the need for the team to win to progress in the tournament.
He discussed the pressure of captaincy and his focus on team success.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan needs to beat England by a high run margin to qualify for the semi-finals.
Babar Azam's performance in the tournament has been a topic of discussion.
